nodes.text: Hoth Ice Planet Adventure Game was a board game that released by Kenner in 1980. It was loosely based on the Battle of Hoth from The Empire Strikes Back.
Objective: Be the first player to acquire sufficient Force to battle and defeat Darth Vader!

Spin to pilot your Millennium Falcon around Hoth. There are incidents along the way and battles for Force Cards with Imperial villains. Plan your strategy in wagering Force cards and spinning against Boba Fett, Stormtrooper, Probot, and AT-AT! Once you have enough Force, you can enter the center of the board and challenge Darth Vader. First player to master the Force and successfully out-spin Darth Vader wins!
